```bayesian_reporting.R
#'
#' @param coef_except Vector of named coefficients (can take regex)
bayes_tbl_sum <- function(bayes_model
                          , add_sigma = FALSE
                          , add_loo = FALSE
                          , add_R2 = FALSE
                          , add_loo_R2 = FALSE
                          , add_convergence = FALSE
                          , apa_table  = FALSE
                          , coef_calc   = "mean"
                          , coef_except = NULL
                          , .low_val    = FALSE
                          , fmt_md      = FALSE){
<|editable_region_start|>

  require(tidyverse)
  require(tidybayes)

  draws <- bayes_model |>
    tidybayes::tidy_draws() |>
    dplyr::select(.chain, .iteration, .draw, dplyr::all_of(coef_na<|user_cursor_is_here|>

  draws
}
<|editable_region_end|>
```

variables.name: draws
variables.value:
Columns:
* .chain: int
* .iteration: int
* .draw: int
* b_Intercept: dbl
* b_age: dbl
* b_treatmentB: dbl
* sd_subject__Intercept: dbl
* sigma: dbl
* lp__: dbl

output:
<|editable_region_start|>

  require(tidyverse)
  require(tidybayes)

  draws <- bayes_model |>
    tidybayes::tidy_draws() |>
    dplyr::select(.chain, .iteration, .draw, dplyr::all_of(coef_names))

  draws
}
<|editable_region_end|>
